channel.title: Balzaretti on Nino Wicaksono
channel.description: Recent content in Balzaretti on Nino Wicaksono

item.title: Vengeance and Liberation, Roma derby
item.description: “Il mio nome e` il simbolo della tua eterna sconfitta” “My name is the symbol of your eternal defeat.” In Roma derby day, no one remember it’s the 4th giornata, a home match, or a 0/1/3 point(s), none of that, it’s rivalry, passion, emotions. It’s beyond. 26th May still clouding over roman heads, the defeat on the Coppa Italia’s final. AS Roma as a group wasn’t able to take all the blame, Danielle De Rossi crying, the always energetic Alessandro Florenzi look sluggish dragging his feet after the final whistle.
